H0.text: Evolution is the process responsible for the growth and repair of human tissue.

H1.text: Germination is the process responsible for the growth and repair of human tissue.

H2.text: Cell division is the process responsible for the growth and repair of human tissue.

H3.text: Natural selection is the process responsible for the growth and repair of human tissue.

A4.text: All cell divisions, regardless of organism, are preceded by a single round of DNA replication.

A5.text: The human body experiences about 10 quadrillion cell divisions in a lifetime.
